Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog:
- Further improvements to `/at mtq` command, allowing it to work better with quests that point towards area rather than point
- Auto-interact option will not automatically interact with most solo duties and with GC representatives at waking sands
- Sprint is now used on `/at mtq` in addition to peloton
